sentences.en: A photographer from the newspaper was loading his camera with film.
sentences.cn: 那家报纸的一名摄影师正往相机里装胶卷。

sentences.en: A photographer had fused the lights, engulfing the entire house darkness.
sentences.cn: 一位摄影师把电灯的保险丝烧断了, 使整栋房子陷于黑暗当中.

sentences.en: A photographer recorded the scene on video for posterity.
sentences.cn: 摄影师用摄像机为后代记录下了这个场景。

sentences.en: As a cover story he generally tells people he is a freelance photographer.
sentences.cn: 为掩饰身份，他一般对外称自己是一名自由摄影师。

sentences.en: As a photographer, he'd found both locations just a trifle disappointing.
sentences.cn: 作为摄影师，他感到两处景点都有点儿不尽如人意。

sentences.en: Grace Robertson started as a photographer with Picture Post in 1947.
sentences.cn: 格雷斯·罗伯逊于1947年参加工作，做了《图片邮报》杂志的一名摄影师。

sentences.en: He pounced on the photographer, beat him up and smashed his camera.
sentences.cn: 他突然扑向摄影师，痛打了他一顿，还摔碎了他的照相机。

sentences.en: I have obtained the services of a top photographer to take our pictures.
sentences.cn: 我已请到了一位顶级摄影师来给我们拍照。

sentences.en: Photographer Weegee shot to fame with his shocking pics of New York crime in the 30s.
sentences.cn: 摄影师维吉以拍摄30年代纽约罪案的骇人照片而声名鹊起。

sentences.en: She looked as if the photographer had caught her by surprise.
sentences.cn: 看上去，她好像被摄影师搞了个猝不及防。

sentences.en: The German-born photographer was admired by writers such as Oscar Wilde.
sentences.cn: 那位德国出生的摄影师受到了奥斯卡·王尔德等作家的敬重。

sentences.en: The photographer snapped a nice photograph of him.
sentences.cn: 摄影师给他拍了一张很棒的快照.

sentences.en: The photographer stopped clicking and hurried around the corner.
sentences.cn: 摄影师停止按动快门，匆匆绕过拐角。

sentences.en: The police arrived, and so did reporters and a photographer from the "Journal".
sentences.cn: 警察赶到了那里，《日报》的记者和摄影师也到了。

words.tran_cn: 上照的；适于摄影的；由光导致的
摄影的；逼真的；（尤指记忆）详细准确的
[印刷] 照相凸版；照相凸版印刷
摄影报道，摄影新闻工作
影印石版画；照相平版印刷品
影印石版术；照相平印术
照相制版工艺；照相制版法
用凹版印刷；用凹版印刷复制

trans.tran_en: someone who takes photographs, especially as a professional or as an artist
